subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: A frightening hit by Zdeno Chara put Montreal’s Max Pacioretty in the hospital, but the N.H.L. will not issue any further sanctions in the incident.
snippet: A frightening hit by Zdeno Chara put Montreal’s Max Pacioretty in the hospital, but the N.H.L. will not issue any further sanctions in the incident.
